title: 2017 Ranked Season Rewards
body: Can anybody confirm when the 2017 ranked season deadline cuts off and if a player gets a small chat restriction, what date is the cutoff for that? Thanks! ^_^

replies.body: The cutoff for being [**disqualified for ranked rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068) is 8/22/2017.

Any punishment on your account normally takes about 3 months to resolve.  For instance, if you got the 10 game chat restrict, you do your 10 games, go unpunished for 3 months, then it's clear and it resets, so if you get punished again, rather than getting the 25 game, you'll get another 10 game.  This is my personal experience ( I mean what?)  and how I've understood everything.

As for the deadline, it's normally announced around the end of worlds, and since season usually goes a bit longer after worlds ends, plus the missions being until Dec 5, I'm assuming Mid/Late December, don't quote me on that.
